channel.title: Memonomics Lab
channel.description: Using social media data to find answers in economics and current affairs.

item.title: The co-evolution of delusion
item.dc:creator: Ralf Martin
item.description: How is anti vaccination sentiment related to covid hoaxism?

item.title: Hoaxism is still going strong
item.dc:creator: Ralf Martin
item.description: Despite - or maybe because - the ongoing pandemic hoaxists are still sticking to their believes. It's also one thing Britain might be world beating.

item.title: Welcome to Memonomics Lab
item.description: We are a group of Imperial College and LSE researchers using social media data to answer questions relevant to economics and current affairs.
